MESSAGE.Translation: Right now I'm supposed to be the past Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: ら、恭介の後を追えばいいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Then all I have to do is follow in his footsteps.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then all I have to do is follow in his footsteps.

MESSAGE.JP: まりは。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words.

MESSAGE.JP: が、リトルバスターズを結成すればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll form the Little Busters myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll form the Little Busters myself.

MESSAGE.JP: ういうことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's it.

MESSAGE.JP: は少し興奮している。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a little excited.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a little excited.

MESSAGE.JP: の答えに辿り着けたことに。
MESSAGE.EN: I had figured out an answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had figured out an answer.

MESSAGE.JP: ばんだ手を服で拭う。
MESSAGE.EN: I wiped my sweaty palm on my shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wiped my sweaty palm on my shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: 標となるのは、鈴の記憶。
MESSAGE.EN: The only guide I can rely on is Rin's memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only guide I can rely on is Rin's memories.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐっていこう、その記憶を。
MESSAGE.EN: Now let's pull those memories out of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now let's pull those memories out of her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me ask you something, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me ask you something, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まず仲良くなったのは、真人と謙吾、どっち？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Which one did you make friends with first, Masato or Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Which one did you make friends with first, Masato or Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「またむずかしいことをきくな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Another tough question...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Another tough question...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「キャッチボールしながらでいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can think while we play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can think while we play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Throw*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Throw*.

MESSAGE.JP: すっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Catch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Catch*.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「たぶん…真人だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It was probably... Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It was probably... Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん、真人だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, it was Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, it was Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded twice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded twice.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いきさつは覚えてる？　何をきっかけに仲良くなったとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you remember the how of it? I mean, how he made friends with you siblings?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you remember the how of it? I mean, how he made friends with you siblings?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつは…賞金首だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He had a... bounty on his head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He had a... bounty on his head.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ものすごい悪ガキだったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He was a complete rotten fruit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He was a complete rotten fruit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「リトルバスターズでやってたことと正反対じゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's the total opposite of the Little Busters' motto...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's the total opposite of the Little Busters' motto...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「恭介はこういっていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kyousuke said this:❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kyousuke said this:❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつを悪の道から更生させ、この町をすくったのはおれだ、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I am the one that set straight his bad ways and saved this entire town.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I am the one that set straight his bad ways and saved this entire town.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それまではどんな町だったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What was the town like before that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What was the town like before that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「真人におびえるスラム街」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A slum district terrorized by Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A slum district terrorized by Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って恭介が言ってたんだね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's what Kyousuke said?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's what Kyousuke said?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ビラも出回ってた。電柱にはってあるんだ。この子を取り押さえたらお礼にいくらっていう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There were even wanted posters on telephone poles around the town, stating a reward for his arrest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There were even wanted posters on telephone poles around the town, stating a reward for his arrest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで賞金首なのか…西部劇のようだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, that explains what you meant by the bounty... It sounds just like a cowboy movie...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, that explains what you meant by the bounty... It sounds just like a cowboy movie...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にはあの馬鹿丸出しの真人が、そんな恐れられていた存在だったなんて、想像もつかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I could not even imagine people being terrorized by Masato, who always acted like an idiot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could not even imagine people being terrorized by Masato, who always acted like an idiot.

MESSAGE.JP: い出したように、ボールを鈴に投げ返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned the ball to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned the ball to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅっ、ぱすっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Throw*, *catch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Throw*, *catch*.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、恭介はその真人をやっつけたわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And Kyousuke took him down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And Kyousuke took him down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん。あたしも手伝ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes. I helped out, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes. I helped out, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「すごく楽しかった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That was really fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That was really fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はは…それはよかったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha... Good for you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha... Good for you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体どんなやり方で倒したんだろう。恭介のことだから、頭を使ってうまくやったんだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: How on earth had Kyousuke done that? One thing I was sure of: he must have used some witty strategies.
MESSAGE.Translation: How on earth had Kyousuke done that? One thing I was sure of: he must have used some witty strategies.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうして、あらくれ真人と友情のけいやくをむすんだんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And thus a bond of friendship was forged between us and the rowdy boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And thus a bond of friendship was forged between us and the rowdy boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今度はゲームみたいだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It suddenly turned into a game...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It suddenly turned into a game...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「他に思い出せることは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anything else you can recall?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anything else you can recall?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…ないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm... nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm... nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ…ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aight... Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aight... Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにか足らないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Do you still lack anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do you still lack anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ううん、十分だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I've got enough to go by.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I've got enough to go by.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅっ、ぱすっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Throw*, *catch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Throw*, *catch*.

MESSAGE.JP: 日の眩しさが失せ、暗くなり始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: The light was gradually starting to dim, and darkness was creeping in.
MESSAGE.Translation: The light was gradually starting to dim, and darkness was creeping in.

MESSAGE.JP: もう少しで今日のキャッチボールもお終いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We were going to have to call it a day soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were going to have to call it a day soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 後の数球は全力で投げさせてあげた。
MESSAGE.EN: I let her throw the last few balls as she pleased.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let her throw the last few balls as she pleased.

MESSAGE.JP: の晩。
MESSAGE.EN: That evening.
MESSAGE.Translation: That evening.

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴の手を強く握って、伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding her hand tightly, I told her something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding her hand tightly, I told her something.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいかい、鈴。よく話を聞いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look, Rin. Listen to me very carefully.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look, Rin. Listen to me very carefully.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕らはふたりでリトルバスターズを作ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The two of us have just formed the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The two of us have just formed the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…いつのまに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What... When did that happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What... When did that happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今作ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうなのか、今しった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that so? I didn't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that so? I didn't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、今教えたからね。今はふたりでリトルバスターズだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's natural because I only told you just now. The two of us now make the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's natural because I only told you just now. The two of us now make the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それまでは理樹ひとりでリトルバスターだったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then you were a Little Buster by yourself until now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then you were a Little Buster by yourself until now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、今ふたりでリトルバスターズを作った。へんなところに食いついてこないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I told you we've just formed the Little Busters. No nitpicking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I told you we've just formed the Little Busters. No nitpicking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今はふたりだけど、これから真人も誘おうと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The members are only you and me at the moment, but I'm going to ask Masato to join too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The members are only you and me at the moment, but I'm going to ask Masato to join too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「リトルバスターズを三人にする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's going to make the third member.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's going to make the third member.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…わかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Got that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Got that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Got that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Got that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人しく頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded earnestly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded earnestly.

MESSAGE.JP: しよし、と思いながら僕は携帯をポケットから取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Being satisfied with that, I took my mobile out of my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being satisfied with that, I took my mobile out of my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯はすぐ繋がった。
MESSAGE.EN: He picked up quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He picked up quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『あいよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[Yeah.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[Yeah.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕だけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『わかってるよ、なんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[I know. What is it?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[I know. What is it?]

MESSAGE.JP: にしすぎなんだろうけど、いつもより対応が冷たく感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I was just being a little too sensitive, but he sounded somehow icier than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I was just being a little too sensitive, but he sounded somehow icier than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今から部屋に来てくれない？　話があるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will you come over to our room? I've got something to tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will you come over to our room? I've got something to tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『…ああ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[...'Kay.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[...'Kay.]

MESSAGE.JP: っさりとした返事。
MESSAGE.EN: His answer was very blunt.
MESSAGE.Translation: His answer was very blunt.

MESSAGE.JP: ー…と電話が切れる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He hung up the phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He hung up the phone.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よんだのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Did you just call him over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Did you just call him over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、今から来てくれるって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, he'll be here soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, he'll be here soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、狭いこの部屋で巨漢の真人と相対するのが恐くなったのか、身を震わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: She shivered; the thought of seeing that huge guy in this small room must be scaring her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shivered; the thought of seeing that huge guy in this small room must be scaring her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫、昔と違って今の真人は謙吾以外とはもめ事を起こさないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No need to worry. Unlike before, he doesn't fight anyone except for Kengo now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No need to worry. Unlike before, he doesn't fight anyone except for Kengo now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「話し合いだけで、わかってくれるはずだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I believe he'll understand us just by talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I believe he'll understand us just by talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れに、ふたりで始めないと意味がない。
MESSAGE.EN: And there was no point unless we started this together.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there was no point unless we started this together.

MESSAGE.JP: ちゃり、とドアが開く。
MESSAGE.EN: The door opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door opened.

MESSAGE.JP: っと頭を下げた真人が入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stepped in with his head bent low.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stepped in with his head bent low.

MESSAGE.JP: がたじろぐが、その体を引き寄せできるだけ近くに置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin shrank back; I put myself as close to her as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin shrank back; I put myself as close to her as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「仲良さそうにやってんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You guys seem to be getting along pretty well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You guys seem to be getting along pretty well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず、座ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, have a seat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, have a seat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「じゃ、失礼するぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, excuse me then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, excuse me then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「失礼も何も、自分の部屋じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Excuse you for what? This is your room, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Excuse you for what? This is your room, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そういやそうだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, of course it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, of course it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って、ちゃぶ台を挟んだ僕たちの正面に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, he sat down across from us.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, he sat down across from us.

MESSAGE.JP: は僕に身を寄せてじっとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin huddled close to me and didn't move.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin huddled close to me and didn't move.

MESSAGE.JP: の隣にはレノンもいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Lennon also sat next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon also sat next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日も帰ってこないつもりだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You weren't going to come back again today if I didn't call you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You weren't going to come back again today if I didn't call you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんなことを訊くために呼んだのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did you call me here just to ask that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did you call me here just to ask that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もちろん、それも関係あることだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course, that's one of the reasons.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course, that's one of the reasons.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the rest?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the rest?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は鈴とふたりでリトルバスターズを作ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin and I have just formed the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin and I have just formed the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ほぉ…それで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hoh... so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hoh... so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人も仲間に入ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Join us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Join us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は答えない。ただ顔を伏せただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't reply; he just faced the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't reply; he just faced the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうすれば、今まで通りこの部屋で一緒に過ごせる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you become one of us, we'll be able to live in this room again like before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you become one of us, we'll be able to live in this room again like before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ほら、鈴からも言ってやってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Rin, you say something to him as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Rin, you say something to him as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「またいっしょにあそぼう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's play together again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's play together again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えが出たのだろうか、ようやく顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato must have made his decision; he lifted his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato must have made his decision; he lifted his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「悪いが…お断りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry... but the answer is no.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry... but the answer is no.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーか残念だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see. That's a pity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see. That's a pity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴も簡単に引き下がらないでよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't give up that easily, Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't give up that easily, Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こいつなんか鬼こわい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But he looks scary as hell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But he looks scary as hell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「話は終わりか？　じゃ、オレはいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you done yet? If so, I'm outta here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you done yet? If so, I'm outta here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、ちょっと待ってよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, wait a second!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, wait a second!❞

MESSAGE.JP: を上げようとした真人を慌てて呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly told him to stay as he tried to stand up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly told him to stay as he tried to stand up.

MESSAGE.JP: は大いに取り乱す。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been thrown completely off balance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been thrown completely off balance.

MESSAGE.JP: を掻きむしって、鈴のほうを向いたり、真人のほうを向いたりする。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned my eyes between Rin and Masato, scratching my head furiously.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned my eyes between Rin and Masato, scratching my head furiously.

MESSAGE.JP: え方は正しいはずなのに…どうして思惑通りに進まない？
MESSAGE.EN: Why weren't things going as planned... even though my idea was supposed to be correct?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why weren't things going as planned... even though my idea was supposed to be correct?

MESSAGE.JP: に出して、直接問いたいぐらいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so vexing that I almost actually asked the question out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so vexing that I almost actually asked the question out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、落ち着けよ、おまえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you? You'd better calm down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you? You'd better calm down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いいたいことがあるなら、はっきり言え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If you've got something to say, just say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If you've got something to say, just say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、こいつ鬼こわいとか、鈴みたいにはっきり言えないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't put it as straight as your ❛he looks scary as hell,❜ Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't put it as straight as your ❛he looks scary as hell,❜ Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「早く終わらせてくれねぇかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Will you please get this done already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Will you please get this done already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったるそうに耳の裏を掻く真人。
MESSAGE.EN: He boredly scratched the back of his ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: He boredly scratched the back of his ear.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、理由を教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　断る理由か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Why I decline?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Why I decline?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に親指と人差し指を置いて一間置く。
MESSAGE.EN: He held his chin with his thumb and index finger and made a short pause.
MESSAGE.Translation: He held his chin with his thumb and index finger and made a short pause.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレが最強だからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝'Cause I'm the strongest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝'Cause I'm the strongest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、おまえ謙吾よりよわいだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, you're weaker than Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, you're weaker than Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「るせえぇ、オレは最強だああぁぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up, I'm the bloody strongest!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up, I'm the bloody strongest!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の大声に鈴が驚いて、身を縮ませる。
MESSAGE.EN: His angry bellow made Rin shrink back.
MESSAGE.Translation: His angry bellow made Rin shrink back.

MESSAGE.JP: リはいつも通りで安心感さえ与えるが、確かに真人の言ってることはおかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: He did sound his usual stupid self, which relieved me, but what he was saying was obviously bizarre.
MESSAGE.Translation: He did sound his usual stupid self, which relieved me, but what he was saying was obviously bizarre.

MESSAGE.JP: 人自身、打倒謙吾を目指していたはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He himself was supposed to have set Kengo as the strongest rival to defeat.
MESSAGE.Translation: He himself was supposed to have set Kengo as the strongest rival to defeat.

MESSAGE.JP: のに、いきなり自分が最強だなんて思ってもみないことを…？
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, why would he suddenly call himself the strongest...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, why would he suddenly call himself the strongest...?

MESSAGE.JP: しかして僕の知らない間に怪我をしている謙吾を倒しちゃったとか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be that he'd already knocked Kengo down without my knowing...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be that he'd already knocked Kengo down without my knowing...?

MESSAGE.JP: や、それで最強を名乗るなんて真人のプライドが許さないはずだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, even if that was the case, his pride should never allow him to proclaim that he was the strongest...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, even if that was the case, his pride should never allow him to proclaim that he was the strongest...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もういいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Can I go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Can I go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、待って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, hold on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, hold on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まだあるのか？　なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Not yet? Now what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Not yet? Now what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: えろ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got to think of something...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got to think of something...

MESSAGE.JP: は必死に言葉を探す。真人をここに繋ぎ止めるための。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately sought for something to say in order to keep him in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately sought for something to say in order to keep him in here.

MESSAGE.JP: も…それは出てこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However... in the end, nothing came out of my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: However... in the end, nothing came out of my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いくぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いに真人が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato eventually got to his feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato eventually got to his feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 中を向ける。ドアを開く。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned around and opened the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned around and opened the door.

MESSAGE.JP: は…見送るだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was... just watch him go.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was... just watch him go.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…オレはたぶんこれから最強を証明し始めるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Guess it's soon time for me to start proving that I'm the strongest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Guess it's soon time for me to start proving that I'm the strongest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中しか見えなくなったところで真人は動きを止めてそう言った。
MESSAGE.EN: He spoke when I could only see his back anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: He spoke when I could only see his back anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「怪我したくなかったら近づくんじゃねぇぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you don't wanna get hurt, stay away from me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you don't wanna get hurt, stay away from me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　それってどういう意味っ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? What's that supposed to mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? What's that supposed to mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: たん。ドアは閉められた。
MESSAGE.EN: He closed the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: He closed the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 静寂が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Silence fell over the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Silence fell over the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…失敗した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I failed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I failed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はうなだれる。
MESSAGE.EN: I dropped my head down in disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dropped my head down in disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ま、あんな鬼こわい奴、いいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, forget about such a scary guy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, forget about such a scary guy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふたりでリトルバスターズだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The two of us can be the Little Busters by ourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The two of us can be the Little Busters by ourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな…。
MESSAGE.EN: No...
MESSAGE.Translation: No...

MESSAGE.JP: たりじゃリトルバスターズじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Us two aren't enough to make the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: Us two aren't enough to make the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: はしばらく呆然としていたが、もうひとつ鈴に告げなくてはならないことを思い出し、鈴に向き直る。
MESSAGE.EN: After a moment of being lost in my thoughts, I remembered something that I had to tell Rin and turned myself to face her.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a moment of being lost in my thoughts, I remembered something that I had to tell Rin and turned myself to face her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もうひとつあるんだよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's one more thing I have to tell you, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's one more thing I have to tell you, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は来週の月曜からこっちの学校に復帰するんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're coming back to this school starting on Monday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're coming back to this school starting on Monday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふたりでリトルバスターズでしょ？　だから、ふたりはいつも一緒にいるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The Little Busters can only exist when we are together. Hence, we have to be together all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The Little Busters can only exist when we are together. Hence, we have to be together all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあぬける。理樹ひとりでリトルバスターにもどってくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then I'm out. You be the Little Buster by yourself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then I'm out. You be the Little Buster by yourself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな簡単に抜けちゃ駄目だよ、それにリトルバスターというものはないんだってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't get out that easily. And there isn't such a thing as a Little Buster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't get out that easily. And there isn't such a thing as a Little Buster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だって、そうなったら、もう、ひーくんやおーちゃんや、てづっちやコバと遊べなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I won't be able to play with Hii-kun, Oo-chan, Tezucchi or Koba anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I won't be able to play with Hii-kun, Oo-chan, Tezucchi or Koba anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはまた休みの日にでも時間作って遊べばいいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can play with them on holidays.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can play with them on holidays.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴のそもそもの義務は学校の授業を受けることなんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Remember, your job is to take classes at this school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Remember, your job is to take classes at this school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今までは長い休憩だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Consider these past days as a long break for recuperation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Consider these past days as a long break for recuperation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今の鈴はあの頃より元気になった。それは自分でもわかるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now you've gotten much better than you were then. Even you realize it, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now you've gotten much better than you were then. Even you realize it, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら、戻ろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then let's go back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then let's go back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「戻るべきだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…しらない人だらけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...There are lots of people I don't know there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...There are lots of people I don't know there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫、僕がずっとそばにいるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't worry. I'll be staying beside you all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't worry. I'll be staying beside you all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「先生に言って、席も近くにしてもらう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm even gonna ask the teacher to put your desk next to mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm even gonna ask the teacher to put your desk next to mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…わかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You got all that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You got all that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくの沈黙の後、鈴は小さく頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a few seconds of silence, she gave a hesitant nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a few seconds of silence, she gave a hesitant nod.
